keyword: how many calories are in a sausage mcmuffin with egg
title: How Many Calories in a Sausage McMuffin with Egg?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a sausage mcmuffin with egg (about 480 kcal), plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and tips for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Sausage McMuffin with Egg?
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Sausage McMuffin with Egg: English muffin, pork sausage patty, folded egg, American cheese; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, ingredients, and custom orders. Check McDonald's app or packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A Sausage McMuffin with Egg contains about 480 calories and 21 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Sausage McMuffin with Egg?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 kcal for the standard version.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in a sausage mcmuffin with egg?
faqs.a: About 21 g of protein per sandwich.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Sausage McMuffin with Egg?
faqs.a: Around 830 mg, mostly from the sausage and cheese.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a sausage mcmuffin with egg?
faqs.a: Yes, about 30 g total carbs, mainly from the English muffin.

faqs.q: Does the Sausage McMuffin with Egg have trans fats?
faqs.a: It contains about 0.5 g of trans fats, primarily from the sausage.
